verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> an <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6099>large<s%> <S%H6099>number<s%> of <S%H4735>livestock.<s%> So when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> that it was <S%H2009>indeed<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4725>suitable<s%> for <S%H4735>livestock,<s%>

the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and to the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H5852>"Ataroth,<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> <S%H5247>Nimrah,<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> <S%H7643>Sebam,<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and <S%H1194>Beon,<s%>

the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5221>conquered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H4735>livestock.<s%> "

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> we have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> let <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants<s%> as a <S%H272>possession;<s%> do not <S%H5674>take<s%> us <S%H5674>across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> "Shall your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> while you <S%H9043>yourselves<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%>?

"Now <S%H4100>why<s%> are you <S%H5106>discouraging<s%> <S%H3820><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H5674>crossing<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> them?
<S%H3541>"This<s%> is <S%H3541>what<s%> your fathers <S%H1>did<s%> when I <S%H6213>sent<s%> them from Kadesh-barnea to <S%H7971>see<s%> the <S%H7200>land.<s%>

"For when they <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> they <S%H5106>discouraged<s%> <S%H3820><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> so that they did not <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> them.
"So the Lord's <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and He <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H518>'None<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H5927>came<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> for they did not <S%H310>follow<s%> Me <S%H4390>fully,<s%>

<S%H1115>except<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> for they have <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>fully.<s%>'

"So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and He made them <S%H5128>wander<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3605>entire<s%> generation of those who had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the Lord was <S%H8552>destroyed.<s%>

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have <S%H6965>risen<s%> up in your fathers' <S%H8478>place,<s%> a <S%H8635>brood<s%> of <S%H2400>sinful<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> to <S%H5595>add<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> to the <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"For if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> Him, He will <S%H3254>once<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H5117>abandon<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and you will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

Then they <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to him and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H6629>sheepfolds<s%> <S%H1448><s%> for our <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for our <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones;<s%>

but we <S%H587>ourselves<s%> will be <S%H9139>armed<s%> <S%H2363>ready<s%> [to go] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H518><s%> we have <S%H935>brought<s%> them to their <S%H4725>place,<s%> while our <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"We will not <S%H7725>return<s%> to our <S%H1004>homes<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H5157>possessed<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"For we will not <S%H5157>have<s%> an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> with them on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and <S%H1973>beyond,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> has <S%H935>fallen<s%> to us on this <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"If<s%> you will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H9139>arm<s%> yourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for the <S%H4421>war,<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H9139>armed<s%> men <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> He has <S%H3423>driven<s%> His <S%H340>enemies<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> Him,

and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> then <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and be <S%H9345>free<s%> of <S%H9345>obligation<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be yours for a <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and be <S%H3045>sure<s%> your <S%H9128>sin<s%> will <S%H4672>find<s%> you out.

<S%H1129>"Build<s%> yourselves <S%H5892>cities<s%> for your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and <S%H1448>sheepfolds<s%> for your <S%H6792>sheep;<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> what you have <S%H3318>promised<s%><S%H4480>.<s%> <S%H6310><s%>"

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6680>commands.<s%>

"Our <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones,<s%> our <S%H802>wives,<s%> our <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H929>cattle<s%> shall <S%H1961>remain<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%>

while your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H9139>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> will <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>says.<s%> "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>gave<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> concerning them to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"If<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H9139>armed<s%> for <S%H4421>battle,<s%> will <S%H5674>cross<s%> with you <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> for a <S%H272>possession;<s%>

but <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> with you <S%H9139>armed,<s%> they shall <S%H270>have<s%> <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> "

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> we will <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"We <S%H5168>ourselves<s%> will <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H9139>armed<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and the <S%H272>possession<s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> [shall remain] with us <S%H4480>across<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them, to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and to the half-tribe of Joseph's <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with its <S%H5892>cities<s%> with [their] <S%H1367>territories,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon<s%> and <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%> and <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%>
and Atroth-shophan and <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%>
and Beth-nimrah and Beth-haran as <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H1448>sheepfolds<s%> for <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%> and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%>

and <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and Baal-meon – [their] <S%H8034>names<s%> being <S%H5437>changed<s%> – and <S%H7643>Sibmah,<s%> and they <S%H7121>gave<s%> [other] <S%H8034>names<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in it.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> to <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and he <S%H3427>lived<s%> in it.
And <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> its <S%H2333>towns,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> them Havvoth-jair.
And <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H7079>Kenath<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> after his own <S%H8034>name.<s%>
